Posts.Content: Sep 12, 2008 06:51PM mimi98 wrote: Hi Angel, I had my mammosite in for a lot longer also.  I had the catheter installed on June 4, radiation was supposed to start on June 9, but I had to much air in the cavity so they couldn't do it.  They put in more saline solution to push out the air in the  balloon.  My radiation started on June 16.  I had to take off work an extra couple of weeks because of the delay. I washed my hair every other day at the salon and I took a bath every day.  My family changed my dressing twice a day and the catheter didn't bother me that much.  I was on antibiotics and didn't have any problems.  Good luck,  Janice
Posts.Title: Catheter for mammosite in for two weeks BEFORE starting rads? angel0921 mimi98
